humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, one out of eight (1/8) axillary lymph nodes is positive for metastasis. Based on the new rules provided, this corresponds to N1 stage, as per Rule 12: N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes (No/Total).

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that one out of eight axillary lymph nodes was positive for metastasis (Axillary 1/8). This corresponds to a pathologic N1 stage, as defined by the American Joint Committee on Cancer (AJCC). The N stage is determined by the number of lymph nodes involved, and in this case, it is one.
